sampleNotes.title: Productivity Tips for Remote Work
sampleNotes.content: Working from home requires discipline and structure. Create a dedicated workspace, establish clear boundaries between work and personal time, use the Pomodoro Technique for focused work sessions, and take regular breaks to maintain productivity.

sampleNotes.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
sampleNotes.content: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn without explicit programming. Key concepts include supervised learning, unsupervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning algorithms.

sampleHabits.title: Morning Meditation
sampleHabits.description: Start each day with 10 minutes of mindfulness meditation

sampleHabits.title: Daily Reading
sampleHabits.description: Read for at least 20 minutes every day
